verbs.description: [ARG0: Rudy Giuliani] [V: made] [ARG1: headlines] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] [ARGM-TMP: when he claimed that he knew first lady Melania Trump believed her husband , President Trump , and not Stormy Daniels ' claims of an extramarital affair . The first lady has responded Thursday] . Here 's what Melania 's spokesperson said " I do n't believe Mrs. Trump has ever discussed her thoughts on anything with Mr. Giuliani , " said Stephanie Grisham , her communications director . The cryptic statement was not a complete denial of the statement Giuliani made , but it was a rebuke to his claim to know anything about what the first lady believed . Giuliani said Wednesday , " She believes her husband and she does n't think it 's true , " referring to the first lady and accusations from the adult film star against the president . “ Tell me what damage she suffered ” The former New York City mayor was speaking at the " Globes " Capital Market Conference in Israel . He continued on to attack Daniels ' character based on her career choices . …
